lexUnit.name: study.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a room for reading, writing, or academic work.

sentence.text: Emily paced around the book-lined study and blamed her father for his hostile attitude to Craig .
As he entered the study , Stephen reflected on how fortunate he had been to obtain this man 's services .
Soon the door stood open and I entered the study .
As he entered the study to which Lord Westbourne had retired , Westbourne simply waved an impatient hand , hardly bothering to turn round from the desk at the sound of Rose 's voice .
Frankie left the headmaster 's study feeling vaguely troubled .
I think he had left the study to look for something .
He must have left the study shortly after herself , and practically sprinted up here .
` The doctor 's locked himself up in his study , sir . "

` Oh Christ , they must have decided to walk ! " he said angrily , and ran from the study .
` I ran into the study and then she hit me .
He looked up , gave a kind of cry and ran upstairs and into the study .
But it was the head who ran to his study to phone .
The frontispiece of Sprat 's History shows a spacious study lined with books and scientific instruments .
He said nothing more , but just showed David into his study .
They were sitting in the study at home , toasting by the fire before going in to dinner .
Emily sat in her father 's study , staring at the mass of figures that danced before her eyes .
They had left Anna sitting in Sister Ignatia 's study , looking at the school prospectus .
They were sitting in Jacob 's study and he looked from his sister to his father in amazement .
At half past nine Teesdale was sitting in his study .
Three weeks later , on the day I became Prime Minister , my first impulse was to sit down in the study which had been Harold 's and write him a letter of appreciation and grateful thanks .
When I went to visit him we sat in his book-lined study surrounded by all the trappings of an academic career but in his garage there were untreated specimens and a range of specialist tools .
Some said he slept in his study while others believed he wandered about the corridors waiting to catch escaping pupils or those who had gone missing .

He had slept little these past three and a half weeks , often waking of his own accord in the pre-dawn darkness and walking through to his personal study to attempt to concentrate on papers of state .

When he did so , he walked straight into his study without changing , and picked up the phone .
Ushering her inside , he walked into his study and just as he was about to close the door she remembered she had n't settled up with him .
The Department is housed in two classrooms and a small study , all of which are pleasantly furnished and help to portray the welcoming , friendly attitude we have towards the pupils .
They wandered slowly into the study and sat down .
At an open window of the study above the laboratory , Doctor Jekyll sat , like a prisoner staring at the world outside .
